abstract: Pennsylvania Rep Chaka Fattah is indicted by federal authorities for bribery and misuse of hundreds of thousands of dollars of federal money, along with funds from his campaign and charity he oversaw; also indicted are Fattah's son Chaka Jr, one of his staff members, a lobbyist and two others.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fattah, Democrat of Pennsylvania, was indicted by the federal authorities in connection with bribery schemes and the misuse of federal, charitable and campaign funds.

headline.main: Chaka Fattah, Pennsylvania Congressman, Indicted on Charges of Misuse of Funds
headline.print_headline: Congressman Is Indicted in Schemes to Get Money

snippet: Mr. Fattah, Democrat of Pennsylvania, was indicted by the federal authorities in connection with bribery schemes and the misuse of federal, charitable and campaign funds.
